info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 06 at 4:14AM EST until January 07 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 8 inches with locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Northern Erie and Southern Erie counties. * WHEN...From this evening through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected to arrive early Friday morning, with rates in excess of 1 inch per hour possible. This can have an enhanced impact on the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
